languages.text: "Нечестивая бессмыслица. Предательство чистой логики, плод больного разума, отвергшего фундаментальные законы". {n}Вокс Паскаля хрипит, словно пересохшее горло больного.{/n}
"It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy, like the dry throat of an ailing man.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нечестивая бессмыслица. Предательство чистой логики, плод больного разума, отвергшего фундаментальные законы". {n}Вокс Паскаля хрипит, словно пересохшее горло больного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy like the dry throat of one stricken with ailment.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「全て不浄であり、馬鹿馬鹿しい。純粋な理論の背信、基本的な法を放棄する病んだ精神の成果」{n}パスカルのヴォクスは病人の乾いた喉のように荒々しい音を立てた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy, like the dry throat of an ailing man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「全て不浄であり、馬鹿馬鹿しい。純粋な理論の背信、基本的な法を放棄する病んだ精神の成果」{n}パスカルのヴォクスは病人の乾いた喉のように荒々しい音を立てた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这一切都是邪恶的胡言乱语。所有的计算都彻底违背了逻辑，背弃了所有基本运算法则，是病态思想的产物。”{n}帕斯卡的声音很沙哑，听起来就像是患了病一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy, like the dry throat of an ailing man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这一切都是邪恶的胡言乱语。所有的计算都彻底违背了逻辑，背弃了所有基本运算法则，是病态思想的产物。”{n}帕斯卡的声音很沙哑，听起来就像是患了病一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist alles unheiliger Unsinn. Ein Verrat an der reinen Logik, ein Auswuchs eines kranken Geistes, der den Naturgesetzen abgeschworen hat." {n}Pasqals Stimme krächzt wie die trockene Kehle eines Kranken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy, like the dry throat of an ailing man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist alles unheiliger Unsinn. Ein Verrat an der reinen Logik, ein Auswuchs eines kranken Geistes, der den Naturgesetzen abgeschworen hat." {n}Pasqals Stimme krächzt wie eine trockene und kranke Kehle.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Un ramassis d'absurdités impies. Une trahison de la logique pure, le fruit d'un esprit malsain qui a renoncé aux lois fondamentales. » {n}La voix de Pasqal est aussi rauque que celle d'un malade.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy, like the dry throat of an ailing man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un ramassis d'absurdités impies. Une trahison de la logique pure, le fruit d'un esprit malsain qui a renoncé aux lois fondamentales. » {n}La voix de Pasqal est aussi rauque que celle d'un malade au gosier desséché.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Es un despropósito blasfemo. Una traición de la lógica pura, fruto de una mente enajenada que ha renunciado a las leyes más fundamentales». {n}La voz de Pasqal es ronca, como si tuviese la garganta seca por alguna dolencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy, like the dry throat of an ailing man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es un despropósito blasfemo. Una traición de la lógica pura, fruto de una mente enajenada que ha renunciado a las leyes más fundamentales». {n}La voz de Pasqal es ronca, como si tuviese la garganta seca por alguna dolencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Din dışı bir saçmalık. Salt mantığa ihanet, temel kanunları görmezden gelen hastalıklı bir zihnin meyvesi." {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, hasta bir insanın kurumuş boğazının çıkardığı ses misali kulak tırmalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is all unholy nonsense. A betrayal of pure logic, the fruit of a diseased mind that has renounced the fundamental laws." {n}Pasqal's vox is raspy, like the dry throat of an ailing man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Din dışı bir saçmalık. Direkt olarak mantığa ihanet ediyorlar. Temel kanunları görmezden gelen hastalıklı bir zihnin meyvesi." {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, hasta bir insanın kurumuş boğazını andıran şekilde gıcırdıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
